snippet.title: 8 Epic Challenges: Don't Try This at Home

localized.description:
Watch all of the videos from today’s ep. http://goo.gl/dgdGUq
YouTube Nation is our daily show that scours the web to help you find great videos weekdays 6pm PT / 9pm ET / 2am GMT and Saturday.

Today, YouTube Nation delivers a collection of crazy challenge videos including people tackling cinnamon, hot peppers, marshmallows, and even a live scorpion.
Let us know what you think of the show in the comments!

Watch new YouTube Nation playlists: 
Check Out Even More Challenges! http://goo.gl/apQAze

Recent YouTube Nation Episodes: http://goo.gl/nQpjbE
Recent YouTube Nation Playlists: http://goo.gl/6yN3Mj

Send us your video picks to be featured in the show!
Do it by sharing a YouTube link and using this hashtag - #YOUTUBENATION
Send in challenges for our senior curator Earnest with this hashtag - #STUMPEARNEST

Subscribe for eps every day: http://youtube.com/youtubenation
Follow us on Twitter for updates: http://twitter.com/youtubenation
Add us to your circle on G+: http://plus.google.com/+youtubenation
Like us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/youtubenation

Jacob’s Channel: http://youtube.com/jacobsoboroff
Jacob’s G+: http://plus.google.com/+JacobSoboroff
Jacob’s Twitter: http://twitter.com/jacobsoboroff

Featured in this show: 

Eating a Live Giant Scorpion http://goo.gl/dgdGUq
By FoodForLouis: http://youtube.com/FoodForLouis

Monster Hunter 3 Ultimate - Hot Pepper Game Review feat. Egoraptor http://goo.gl/Rwm3Ug
By Hot Pepper Gaming: http://youtube.com/HotPepperGaming

Food Gauntlet: Cinnamon Challenge, Ghost Chili Peppers, and Bananas Sprite http://goo.gl/IbdELc
By Break: http://youtube.com/break

Moruga Scorpion Chili Challenge!  http://goo.gl/IJY2u5
By YouTube Nation: http://youtubenation.com

CHUBBY BUNNY CHALLENGE http://goo.gl/kHYntm
By hoiitsroi: http://youtube.com/hoiitsroi

The Original Cinnamon Challenge Video http://goo.gl/gTtDSz
By Chuck Keith: http://youtube.com/Jesusfreakhbc

6 year old completes the cinnamon challenge in less than 20 seconds http://goo.gl/Zy5paj
By MrDeanberger: http://youtube.com/MrDeanberger

NO MIRROR MAKEUP CHALLENGE! http://goo.gl/B4ro7c
By grav3yardgirl: http://youtube.com/grav3yardgirl

One Man. Two Bottles of Family Size Mustard (1.68 Liters, 18,000+mg of Sodium) | Furious Pete http://goo.gl/7OTxqe
By Furious Pete: http://youtube.com/furiouspete123

HIS NAME IS PEWDIEPIE (Song with PewDiePie samples) - Song Challenge 1 - Roomie http://goo.gl/TjHoR0
By RoomieOfficial: http://youtube.com/RoomieOfficial

YouTube Nation
Watch YouTube's most shareable moments Monday -- Friday 6:00PM PT/ 9:00PM ET and Saturday.
Now you’ll have no excuse to fall behind on any of the most popular, exciting and unexpected videos of the day. Don’t forget to join the #YouTubeNation conversation and let us know what you’re watching.

Brought to you by Verizon - http://VerizonWireless.com 
Jacob’s wardrobe provided by Band of Outsiders - http://bandofoutsiders.com
